p: The average distance of C1 and M pro is approximately in range, with little fluctuation during the simulation period. However, the final and initial distance is almost similar ( Figure 7). The distant matrix signifies the C1 and M pro distance stability during the simulation period. This approach might be useful to infer the strong binding affinity during the simulation period (Ernst et al., 2015; Khan, Ashfaq-Ur-Rehman et al., 2020). The average distance is commonly affected when a variant occurs at the active site of target proteins during the course of therapy, causing drug resistance ( Figure 8).
